page.title: 06HOLIDAY ACCOMODATION
page.content:
The Lindisfarne Hotel has 11 letting bedrooms.It is closed from November_ February.It is open to none_Residents .There is a very large garden with tables for outdoor meals.There is a grass tennis court.A wide range of food and drinks is available. Bed and Breakfast or Full Accommodation.Children welcome.
The Catholic Camp. St.Aiden's Camp began as a boy's camp using canvus tents.It has now got a modern dormitory block and a kitchen block.Girls have certain weeks in the holidays when they can come,but it is mostly boys from the Newcastle area.The staff are mostly teachers from Newcastle.There is a Chapel attached to the camp.
